EmailTemplate.name: Resource Center Launch
EmailTemplate.subject: Subscriber exclusive: Introducing the Resource Center
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Corporate bylaws, codes of ethics, governance guidelines, and more
Introducing the Compliance Week Resource Center, an exclusive subscriber benefit.
» Search and download thousands of documents such as corporate bylaws, governance guidelines, and codes of ethics.
» Also access past conference presentations, handouts, slide decks, and other items from CW events.
How do I get into the Resource Center?
Click here for the quick guide or follow the steps below:
Log in to complianceweek.com and select 'Resource Center' from the navigation bar. Click this button: Browse, search, and share—and save items for later:
We know you continually improve your compliance program. We continually support your efforts.
